Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â»-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â«		

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Exploring lost empires, finding priceless treasures, punishing villains in mortal combat: it's all in a day's work for adventurer Lara Croft (Angelina Jolie). 

A secret from her father's (Jon Voight) past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge: the Triangle of Light, a legendary artefact with the power to alter space and time. Lara must find the Triangle before it falls in to the clutch of the Illuminati, a secret society bent on world domination. To stop the Illuminati, Lara will have to survive a cross-continental chase filled with unimaginable danger. But for the Tomb Raider, danger is the name of the game.
